languages.text: "Интересно, сколько он вот так просидел. Вахту? Три? Шепотки лопочут, что никому до него не было дела. Но у нас к нему дело есть... Странно".
"I wonder how long he's been sitting here like this. A watch? Three? The whispers say nobody cared because he didn't matter, but they also say he's somehow supposed to matter to us... Strange."
languages.original_text: "Интересно, сколько он вот так просидел. Вахту? Три? Шепотки лопочут, что никому до него не было дела. Но у нас к нему дело есть... Странно".

traits.locale_text: "I wonder how long he's been sitting here like this. A watch? Three? The whispers say nobody cared because he didn't matter, but they also say he's supposed to matter to us, somehow... Strange."
"I wonder how long he's been sitting here like this. A watch? Three? The whispers say nobody cared because he didn't matter, but they also say he's supposed to matter to us, somehow... Strange."
"I wonder how long he's been sitting here like this. A watch? Three? The whispers say nobody cared because he didn't matter, but they also say he's somehow supposed to matter to us... Strange."

"I wonder how long he's been sitting here like this. A watch? Three? The whispers say nobody cared because he didn't matter, but they also say he's somehow supposed to matter to us... Strange."

languages.text: « Je me demande depuis combien de temps il est assis là, comme ça. Un tour de garde ? Trois ? Les voix me disent que personne ne s'est soucié de lui parce qu'il ne comptait pas, mais aussi qu'il est censé compter pour nous... Étrange. »
languages.original_text: "I wonder how long he's been sitting here like this. A watch? Three? The whispers say nobody cared because he didn't matter, but they also say he's somehow supposed to matter to us... Strange."

traits.locale_text: « Je me demande depuis combien de temps il est assis là, comme ça. Un tour de garde ? Trois ? Les voix me disent que personne ne s'est soucié de lui parce qu'il ne comptait pas, mais aussi qu'il est censé compter pour nous... Étrange. »

languages.text: «Me pregunto cuánto lleva aquí. ¿Una guardia? ¿Tres? Los susurros dicen que a nadie le importa porque es irrelevante, pero que para nosotros sí es relevante de algún modo... Qué raro».
languages.original_text: "I wonder how long he's been sitting here like this. A watch? Three? The whispers say nobody cared because he didn't matter, but they also say he's somehow supposed to matter to us... Strange."

traits.locale_text: «Me pregunto cuánto lleva aquí. ¿Una guardia? ¿Tres? Los susurros dicen que a nadie le importa porque es irrelevante, pero que para nosotros sí es relevante de algún modo... Qué raro».

languages.text: 「彼、いつからこうして座っているのかしら。時計1つ分？3つ分？囁きは、彼は重要人物じゃなかったから誰も気にもとめなかったと言うけれど、彼が何らかの形で私たちにとって重要人物になるはずと言うのよ…変な話ね」
languages.original_text: "I wonder how long he's been sitting here like this. A watch? Three? The whispers say nobody cared because he didn't matter, but they also say he's somehow supposed to matter to us... Strange."

traits.locale_text: 「彼、いつからこうして座っているのかしら。時計1つ分？3つ分？囁きは、彼は重要人物じゃなかったから誰も気にもとめなかったと言うけれど、彼が何らかの形で私たちにとって重要人物になるはずと言うのよ…変な話ね」

languages.text: “不知道这个人已经在这里待多久了，一巡吗？或者三巡？那些低语声说没人在乎他，因为这个人并不重要。但那些声音还说，这个人对我们来说应该还挺重要的……真奇怪。”
languages.original_text: "I wonder how long he's been sitting here like this. A watch? Three? The whispers say nobody cared because he didn't matter, but they also say he's somehow supposed to matter to us... Strange."

traits.locale_text: “不知道这个人已经在这里待多久了，一巡吗？或者三巡？那些低语声说没人在乎他，因为这个人并不重要。但那些声音还说，这个人对我们来说应该还挺重要的……真奇怪。”

languages.text: "Ich frage mich, wie lange er schon so hier sitzt. Eine Wachschicht? Drei? Das Flüstern sagt, niemand nahm Anteil, weil er ohne Bedeutung ist, aber irgendwie soll er für uns von Bedeutung sein ... Merkwürdig."
languages.original_text: "I wonder how long he's been sitting here like this. A watch? Three? The whispers say nobody cared because he didn't matter, but they also say he's somehow supposed to matter to us... Strange."

traits.locale_text: "Ich frage mich, wie lange er schon so hier sitzt. Eine Wachschicht? Drei? Das Flüstern sagt, niemand nahm Anteil, weil er ohne Bedeutung ist, aber irgendwie soll er für uns von Bedeutung sein ... Merkwürdig."

languages.text: "Ne zamandır böyle burada duruyor acaba?.. Bir vardiya olmuş mudur? Ya üç? Fısıltılara göre önemsiz biri olduğu için kimse umursamamış. Fakat bizim için önemliymiş de... Tuhaf."
languages.original_text: "I wonder how long he's been sitting here like this. A watch? Three? The whispers say nobody cared because he didn't matter, but they also say he's somehow supposed to matter to us... Strange."
